name: Freestyle Mage
description: In the Farend Neverland, the line between the Inworld and the Outworld is becoming more and more unstable because of some mystery power. The Ancient Crack Guardian 'Mornode' is missing, and you as the only student of Mornode will take the responsibility to stand up and break through the attack of Crack Devils. Dive into the Inworld to trace the footprint of Mornode, build your own magic combo style to fight, reveal the mystery of Cracks, and make use of your own battle style to challenge strong and unique Crack Lords.
